rooms.Name: At the noodle bar
rooms.Description:
A long row of stools are here in front of a busy Noodle Bar counter.
Flickering neon lights crackle above the chipped countertop which is
cluttered with plates of sushi, bowls, chopsticks, and various utensils.
The food must be good since most of the stools are taken.  Steam rises
from the woks behind the counter while the cooks rush back and forth
serving their customers.

Exits.Description: You'll have to climb over the counter to go there.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the top of some grimy, rain-slick stairs which
lead down to the subway station.  Rusty iron bars serve as handrails
along the stairs which lead deep underground.  You can feel a blast of
cold, foul air coming from below.

Exits.Description: A crowded noodle bar is just a few steps away.
Some old apartments are just down the street.
Stairs lead down towards the subway station.

rooms.Name: Behind the counter
rooms.Description:
Steam and the smell of cooking food surrounds you as you stand in the
middle of the noodle bar.  Rows of black iron woks filled with shrimp,
chicken, and various vegetables are sizzling along the back.  Piles of
cracked plates and tarnished knives and forks are stacked below the
counters, along with dozens of cardboard boxes filled with produce.
A freezer door is at the rear but it has a heavy padlock on it.

Exits.Description: A heavy stainless steel door leads to the freezer.
If you climb over the counter to the south, you can get back on the street.

rooms.Name: In the freezer
rooms.Description:
It's freezing cold inside this walkin freezer.  Despite the frigid
temperature, it still smells like something has spoiled in here.
Boxes and crates with Chinese writing on them are piled up to the
ceiling.  For some strange reason, some of the boxes have a picture
of a dog on the side.  The exit is to the south.

Exits.Description: A heavy stainless steel door is the only way out.

rooms.Name: On the stairs
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a long, dark stairway which angles down toward the
subway station.  The stairs look rather odd and you suddenly realize
that you are climbing a long-broken escalator.  Above you the sounds
of the city sound oddly muffled, while below odd sounds echo in the
damp air that swirls up from below.

Exits.Description: The stairs lead up toward the street.
You can see the bottom of the stairs in the distance.

rooms.Name: At the turnstiles
rooms.Description:
Eight rusty turnstiles stand side by side waiting for you to drop a 
token into their slot.  To the east stands a row of token machines,
most of which have been broken into.  Beyond the turnstiles to the
north is the eastern end of the subway platform.  Behind you are the
stairs leading back up to the city streets.

Exits.Description: Over the turnstiles you can see the subway platform.
A stairway leads up towards the south.

rooms.Name: East side of the platform
rooms.Description:
Standing on the eastern end of the underground subway platform, you
shiver in the chill breeze blowing from the dark tunnels ahead.  You
can see the platform stretching into the darkness to the west while
to the south the exit turnstiles stand waiting.

Exits.Description: You can hear the powered rail crackling down on the tracks.
Beyond the exit turnstiles you can see token machines and the stairs.
The platform continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Center of the platform
rooms.Description:
Here at the center of the subway station platform, you can clearly see
the dark tunnels at both ends of the sunken track to the north.  Sparks
of electricity shower occasionally from the high voltage rails, filling
the air with the smell of ozone.  The cold breeze blowing fitfully from
the subterranean tunnels does little to disperse the odor.  The
platform continues to the east and the west.

Exits.Description: You can hear the powered rail crackling down on the tracks.
The platform continues to the east.
The platform continues to the west.

rooms.Name: West side of the platform
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of a long subway platform.  A foul, damp wind
is blowing here from the black tunnel entrance that is in front of you.
An ancient, abandoned subway car is to the north covered with graffiti.
Piles of debris rustle at your feet while the sounds of rats, or something
worse, echoes in the darkness.

Exits.Description: The ancient subway car's door looks easy to open.
The platform continues to the east.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Most of the graffiti is unintelligible, having something to do with some
sort of gang called the Angels of Darkness.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside the front entrance of the Ford Apartments.
This crumbling building was constructed well over a century ago and
has been rebuilt several times.  Only several stories tall, this
neo-gothic structure is soot-blackened and slowly crumbling into
obsolescence.

Exits.Description: A heavy glass door leads into the building.
A subway station entrance is just to the east.
A heavy glass door leads into the theater lobby.

rooms.Name: In the lobby
rooms.Description:
You are in the central lobby of the Ford Apartment Building.  The lobby
is decorated with lots of ferns and overstuffed chairs.  There is
a small shop to the east and the front desk to the west.  The center
of the building is open with walkways circling each floor.  There is
a lift on the north side of the lobby.

Exits.Description: An accordian-like metal door leads to the lift.
A small gift shop lies just beyond the door.
A heavy glass door leads back to the street.
The front desk is just to the west.

rooms.Name: The front desk
rooms.Description:
The front desk of the apartment building is a massive, oak counter
with rows of mail cubbyholes and keys lined up on the back wall.
There is a large register on the counter and some brochures on the
off-world colonies.  The odor of cigarettes is very strong here.

Exits.Description: The rather musty lobby is just beyond the desk.

rooms.Name: The gift shop
rooms.Description:
This grimy little store has definitely seen better days.  Most of the
shelves are empty and what little there is for sale doesn't interest
you very much.  The hotel lobby was a lot more exciting.

Exits.Description: The lobby is just beyond the door.

rooms.Name: In the lift - first floor
rooms.Description:
You are in a creaky, rusty lift that occasionally shudders and groans
and makes you nervous as hell.  Through the cage you can see the lobby
of the apartment building.  The controls are a simple up and down
button, both of which are worn to near illegibility.

Exits.Description: The lift door is rusty and difficult to move.
A sputtering neon tube lights the lift.

rooms.Name: In the lift - second floor
rooms.Description:
Stopped at the second floor, you have a nice view of the lobby below.
The lift groans ominously and smells strongly of grease and hot
electronics.  It will be nice to get off as soon as possible.

Exits.Description: The lift exit is to your north.
A sputtering neon tube lights the lift.
The floor lies beneath your feet.

rooms.Name: In the lift - third floor
rooms.Description:
The third floor is dark and musty, you can't see very much from inside
the lift.  You can hear the sound of water dripping and the soft 
flutter of wings.  You can hear your blood rushing in your ears as
each breath echoes faintly in the darkness.

Exits.Description: The lift exit is to the north.
The floor lies beneath your feet, of course.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the second floor walkway which leads to several
different apartments.  The lift is directly to the south as is the
open central atrium of the building.  You can see several people
moving around the lobby below.  The hallway goes both east and west
and you can see both turn towards the south.

Exits.Description: The lift is just to your south.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the second floor walkway where it turns
between the north and east walls.  You can clearly see the lift just
to the west and through the rusty railing, you can see the lobby far
below.  There is a door to the north.

Exits.Description: This door has the number 203 on it.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
You're at the end of the walkway which runs along the inside of the
second floor.  The sounds of the lobby drift up from below as you
stand outside a door to your east.  You can see the lift just to the
northwest, just past the point where the walkway turns west.

Exits.Description: This door has the number 204 on it.

rooms.Name: phantom room
rooms.Description:
This room used in blade runner zone as room past locked doors that
do not lead anywhere.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing where the second floor walkway turns to run along the
north and west walls.  Through the rusty iron railings you can see the
lobby below and the lift just to your east.  There is a door to the
north.

Exits.Description: This door has the number 202 on it.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of the second floor walkway looking over
the open atrium in the middle of the apartment building.  You can see
the lift to the northeast through the rusty iron railing and far below,
several people are moving about.  There is a door to the west.

Exits.Description: The door has the number 201 on it.

rooms.Name: The foyer
rooms.Description:
The foyer into this apartment is large with high, vaulted ceilings.
Soft glowing neon tubes light the cluttered interior of this apartment
where sheets cover most of the furniture and dust covers everything else.  
You think you detect some faint sounds of movement somewhere inside.
The exit is to the east.

Exits.Description: The front door is made of some type of dark metal.

rooms.Name: The living room
rooms.Description:
The living room is filled with big, comfortable furniture.  A huge
wool carpet covers the floor where stains and debris make the pattern
difficult to distinguish.  A space heater is positioned in front of
a large couch that is covered with journals on genetic engineering.

Exits.Description: A sliding glass door leads to the balcony.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
This short hallway leads from the foyer down towards what you assume
are the bedrooms.  There is a brass coatrack mounted to the wall and
you detect the faint odor of chemicals in the air.  You can see a
flickering light coming from under the door just to the north.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the next room.
A door leads to the next room.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This brass coatrack has hooks for eight different garments.  It is
heavily tarnished and appears to be somewhat loosely mounted in the
wall.

rooms.Name: The master bedroom
rooms.Description:
This large bedroom is furnished with a massive trestle bed with matching
dressers on either side.  Clothing and dirty dishes are strewn all
over the floor and there is a book on the nightstand.  There
is a beautiful marble chess set with a game in progress set in the
middle of the floor.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This large antique trestle bed is beautifully crafted from raw oak
stained dark by time.  The heavy comforter thrown over the bed does not
hide the unmade bed beneath.  The bed has a somewhat unpleasant, sour
odor and looks rather unappealing.

This heavy medical journal is on Methuslah's Syndrome.  You might find it
interesting if you were having trouble sleeping.

Both dressers are heavy, ornate pieces of furniture with some of the
drawers missing.  Most of the drawers are empty since so many clothes
appear to be strewn about on the floor.

rooms.Name: The bedroom
rooms.Description:
This room has been converted into some sort of makeshift laboratory.
There are mountains of arcane equipment, books, papers, and various
electronic devices whose purpose you can't even begin to guess.
There is a strong chemical odor in this room as well as the faint
odor of decay.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.

rooms.Name: The hallway
rooms.Description:
This short hallway leads from the bedrooms to the east to the kitchen.
The carpeting shows signs of heavy wear here and the walls are marked
and stained.  There is a door to the north from which you can hear
the sound of dripping water.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the next room.

rooms.Name: The bathroom
rooms.Description:
This large bathroom is dramatically done in black enamel and brass.
Mirrors cover the walls and the floor has a black and white checkerboard
pattern.  Once beautiful, this magnificent facility is now stained,
cracked, and smells of mildew.  If you were desperate you might make
use of the oddly small toilet or stub.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This huge black tub has ornate brass faucets and numerous spa jets
ringing its perimeter.  Soap scum has marred the beauty of this
elegant tub where water drips constantly from the poorly maintained
plumbing.

This toilet is oddly smaller than usual and a quick, nervous glance
reveals that it still works.

The sink appears to be carved from a single, massive slab of black marble.
Ornate brass faucets match the ones in the tub, and drip just as
incessantly.

rooms.Name: The kitchen
rooms.Description:
The kitchen is filthy and cluttered with piles of plates and cooking
utensilss.  Open cans and vacupacks litter the floor, while the
freezedry reconstitutor has been taken apart for some reason.  The
oven looks operational and the refrigerator is humming quietly.  A
single neon ring lights the room brightly.

rooms.Name: The dining room
rooms.Description:
The dining room is empty except for a couple of mismatched chairs.
The floor is covered with sawdust and splinters leaving you to believe
that the table may have been cut into pieces.  An elaborate crystal
chandelier hangs over the center of the room.

rooms.Name: The balcony
rooms.Description:
This spacious balcony has a spectacular view of the city despite the
fact that it is only on the second floor.  Heavy cast iron railings
wrap around the balcony and there are some rotting pieces of lawn
furniture out here.  It is cold and drizzling and you consider
retreating back into the apartment.

Exits.Description: A sliding glass door leads back into the apartment.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 7
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside of a huge, ancient building that looks like an
old train station or warehouse.  Tall windows line both sides of the
building and on the rooftop you can see Police spinners landing and
taking off from the landing pad.  The station seems pretty busy and
its oppressive appearance makes you reluctant to go inside.

Exits.Description: The massive steel door is marked 'Police'.
A door with a broken lock leads into an old warehouse.

rooms.Name: Inside the station
rooms.Description:
The interior of the police station is a huge room with a very high
ceiling.  Rows of windows pierce the east and west walls, high off of
the floor.  The day sergeant sits to the west, the exit is to
the north, and to the south are numerous benches and chairs where the
police deal with criminals and their victims.  The air is rather smoky
despite the slowly turning fans that hang from the ceiling.

Exits.Description: This door leads back onto the street.

rooms.Name: At the day sergeant's desk
rooms.Description:
Here by the front door is where the day sergeant normally sits.  There
is a cluttered oak desk behind which he keeps track of the daily
business of the police station.  You notice empty donut boxes piled
up behind the desk.

rooms.Name: In the waiting room
rooms.Description:
The windows high above barely illuminate this part of the police station
waiting room.  Rows of benches here remind you of the interior of a
train station.  Various people move about and the hum of conversation echoes
through the smoky, dim room.

rooms.Name: In the waiting room
rooms.Description:
Rows of benches run side by side here where policemen speak with victims
and accused criminals.  There is a great deal of debris on the floor,
including lots of cigarette butts that must be the reason for the smoky
haze that covers the large waiting room around you.  There is a door in
sight to the south and the exit to the north.

rooms.Name: In the waiting room
rooms.Description:
Here at the back of the police station waiting room the crowd has
thinned somewhat, perhaps because people do not want to get too close
to the grimy cellblock that is just to the south.  Flickering neon
lights brightly illuminate the cellblock, casting long shadows behind
you.

Exits.Description: The door reads "Interrogation Room."

rooms.Name: In the waiting room
rooms.Description:
Here at the far end of the waiting room you can see just how large this
room is.  The exit door is barely visible through the smoke far to the
north.  An office door is to your south and you can see an opening a
ways to the west.

Exits.Description:
The frosted glass window on the door reads "Inspector Bryant - Blade
Runner Section Commander."
A soundproof door with "INTERROGATION" on it is here.

rooms.Name: Bryant's office
rooms.Description:
This cramped office is cluttered and dirty.  There is a large desk with
an incredibly ugly lamp and piles of papers.  A television flickers from
a wall mount next to an old coatrack and a wooden file cabinet.  The
windows that once looked out over the waiting room have been painted 
over.  A single fan blade turns slowly overhead, stirring the stale
cigarette smoke that seems to fill the entire station.

Exits.Description: This door has a large, frosted glass window.

rooms.Name: Interrogation room
rooms.Description:
This small room has heavy soundproof walls and a large mirror on the
wall.  There is a single chair in the middle of the room with two cuffs
attached to the arms.  There are some dark stains on the floor which
you hope are just old coffee stains.

Exits.Description: The soundproof door has no knob on it.

rooms.Name: Cell block entrance
rooms.Description:
A massive door made of steel bars separates you from the dangerous
criminals that undoubtedly are locked up in the cellblock to the
south.  The acrid smell of disinfectant and unwashed bodies assaults
your nose as you stand beneath the flickering neon lights.

Exits.Description: A heavy barred door leads into the cell block.

rooms.Name: Cellblock hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a short, brightly lit cellblock hallway.  There are
two cells doors to either side of you and two more doors to your south.
The exit door is to the north.

Exits.Description: A heavy barred door leads back into the station.
The heavy steel door has a faded number 1 on it.
The heavy steel door has a faded number 4 on it.

rooms.Name: Cellblock hallway
rooms.Description:
You are at the end of the cellblock hallway.  Two cell doors are on
either side of you and there are two more just to your north.  At the
very end is the exit, a heavy steel door.  The unpleasant odors and
the overbright lights make you want to leave as soon as possible.

Exits.Description: The heavy steel door has a faded number 2 on it.
The heavy steel door has a faded number 3 on it.

rooms.Name: Holding cell number 3
rooms.Description:
This small cell has the usual stainless steel toilet and sink with a
hard bunk along the wall.  There is a large dark stain on the floor
which has a faint brownish tinge to it.  Like the rest of the cellblock,
this cell smells strongly of antiseptics and some less pleasant odors.
The usual graffiti is scrawled on the walls.

Exits.Description: The heavy steel door is rusty but solid.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The badly scrawled graffiti reads:
   Fiery the angels fell.
   Deep thunder rode around their shores.
   Burning with the fires of Orc.

rooms.Name: Holding cell number 2
rooms.Description:
This cell is a bit cleaner than the rest.  The stainless steel sink,
toilet, and the hard bunk all look fairly clean.  Perhaps the recent
inmates were cleaner than the usual customers here.  Numerous obscene
drawings cover the walls, as well as the usual written graffiti.

Exits.Description: The heavy steel door is rusty but solid.

ExtraDescs.Description: The graffiti reads "Booof wrote this zone."

rooms.Name: Holding cell number 1
rooms.Description:
This small cell has thousands of thin, vertical scratches in the walls
as if some inmate repeatedly dragged his fingernails down the walls,
gouging out the paint from the concrete.  There is the usual steel sink
and toilet, and a somewhat sagging bunk.  As with most places like this,
graffiti covers the walls.

Exits.Description: The heavy steel door is rusty but solid.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The graffiti reads:
   Toad was here
   INCEPT DATE:  12 June, 2016
   FUNC:  Colonization Defense Prog
   PHYS:  A
   MENT:  A

rooms.Name: Holding cell number 4
rooms.Description:
This small cell has a simple bunk with a metal toilet and sink.  The
concrete floor looks freshly hosed down.  You wonder what the police
may have been cleaning up.  The smell of strong antiseptics makes
your  nose itch as you look at the graffiti on the wall.

Exits.Description: The heavy steel door is rusty but solid.

ExtraDescs.Description: Some has scrawled the words, "Ridley Scott is god" on the wall.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the street outside of the notorious nightclub
owned by Taffy Lewis.  The street is brightly lit by the neon lights
which surround the sign describing the entertainment available within.
You notice that they do take all major credit cards.

Exits.Description: A heavy armored door leads into the club.
The door to an abandoned storefront is to the south.
An outdoor sushi bar is just down the street to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The sign shows a picture of a beautiful woman with a large snake draped
strategically across her nude body.  The caption reads "SEE MISS SOLAMAY
AND HER SERPENT.  SEE HER TAKE THE PLEASURES FROM THE SERPENT THAT ONCE
CORRUPTED MAN."

rooms.Name: The cloakroom
rooms.Description:
Standing just inside the entrance to Taffy Lewis' nightclub, you can hear 
music, laughter, and clinking glass coming from the smoky room to the
north.  A hatcheck girl is here to take your coat and hat if you want.
Open 24 hours a day, this club is notorious for attracting the rich
and powerful, as well as the leading underworld figures in the sector.
Hope you brought lots of money as the drink are very expensive here.

Exits.Description: A busy bar lies just inside the club.
An armored door leads back out to the street.

rooms.Name: At the bar
rooms.Description:
Here in the center of the long wooden bar is where Taffy Lewis is known
to hold court.  With a commanding view of the entire nightclub, including
the front door, Taffy can keep on eye on his business and his customers.
The bartop here is a bit cleaner than the rest of the bar although there
are still numerous glasses and cigarettes covering the polished surface.

Exits.Description:
The bar continues to the east.  Just past the end you can see the
dance floor and the stage.
The cloakroom and club entrance are to the south.
The bar continues to the west.

rooms.Name: At the bar
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the west end of the nightclub with your back to the
door and a nice view of the whole establishment.  The long wooden bar 
stretches towards the west where you can see the dance floor in the
distance.  The bar is covered with empty glasses and smoldering cigarette
butts in ashtrays.  There is a payphone on the wall.

Exits.Description: The bar continues to the east.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This visiphone has an "OUT OF ORDER" message flashing faintly on its fuzzy
video screen.  Someone has attempted to pirate some calls as the front
panel has been loosened and some wires are hanging from the bottom.

rooms.Name: At the bar
rooms.Description:
Here at the eastern end of the bar, the music from the dance floor is
so loud you can barely hear yourself talk.  Through the cigarette haze
and the flickering lights you can see a stage to the northeast.  The
polished top of the bar is cluttered with dozens of empty glasses and
piles of half-smoked cigarettes.

Exits.Description: The dance floor is directly in front of you.
The bar continues to the west.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor
rooms.Description:
The green dance floor is just south of the stage and east of the bar.
Lights and speakers mounted on the ceiling keep the music blasting
and the dancers well illuminated.  The floor is rather sticky here,
probably from too many spilled drinks.  You feel a slight urge to
break into the electric slide.

Exits.Description: The stage is only a few feet above the dance floor.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor
rooms.Description:
The dance floor is made of some sort of green wood, probably from an
Offworld colony.  Highly polished, the floor reflects the various lights
that bathe the dance floor from above.  Small ceramic speaker modules
direct loud music from the ceiling to keep the dancers moving.  The bar
can be seen to the west while the stage is to the north.

Exits.Description: The stage lies just to the north.  You could climb up with no problem.
A sign on the door reads "DO NOT DISTURB."

rooms.Name: The sound booth
rooms.Description:
This tiny room is bathed with the soft lights from all of the electronic
equipment that has been installed in racks covering all three
walls.  Amplifieres, mixers, reverb units, holoprojection generators,
and a small ESPER computer are mixed in with wires, cables, and pieces
of equipment you can't identify.  The air is very warm from all of the
equipment but luckily fresh air is circulating through a small vent in
the ceiling.

Exits.Description: A door leads back onto the dance floor.

rooms.Name: On stage
rooms.Description:
Here on stage right, you can see the majority of the nightclub through
the smoke and crowd.  The blinking stage lights are distracting and
make your stomach feel slightly queasy.  The heavy green curtain
that hangs behind the stage smells like must and cigarette smoke.  The
dance floor is a short hop to the south.

rooms.Name: On stage
rooms.Description:
The left side of the stage looks over the dance floor and has a good
view of the bar.  The floor is worn but clean and various colored
stage lights blink on and off, giving the stage a somewhat surreal
appearance.  A heavy green curtain hangs behind the stage.

Exits.Description: A heavy green curtain hangs behind the stage.

rooms.Name: Backstage
rooms.Description:
Here behind the stage curtain is a constant hub-bub of activity.  With
dressing rooms, the stage, and the stage door here, people are coming
and going around the clock.  There are ropes controlling the curtains
on the walls and some electrical panels to control the lights.
You can feel the vibration of the loud music playing on the dance 
floor on the other side of the curtain to the south.

Exits.Description: The dressing room is just to the north.
The stage door leads out to a dark alley.
A heavy green curtain is draped behind the stage.
A sign on this black door reads "WARDROBE."

rooms.Name: The dressing room
rooms.Description:
The dressing room has several vanities with large, well-lit mirrors for
the various entertainers to dress and prepare themselves.  Piles of
makeup containers and hair grooming items litter the tops of the
dressing room tables.  The usual hair driers, towels, and bathrobes
are hanging next to the shower stall to the west.

Exits.Description: The dressing room door is always opening and closing.
A clear plastic curtain hangs in front of the shower.

rooms.Name: In the shower
rooms.Description:
This standard electrostatic shower stall could use a good cleaning.  The
controls are heavily caked with soap scum and small sequins are all over
the floor.  The stall has all of the usual bathing items in it.

Exits.Description: A clear plastic curtain barely hides you from view.

rooms.Name: The wardrobe room
rooms.Description:
This small room is filled with racks and racks of hanging clothes.
Mostly elaborate costumes, the sequins glitter gives the room the
look of a treasure room.  The smell of sweat and must fills the room
where the floor has not been swept for a long time.  The muffled sounds
from the dance floor echo hollowly in the wardrobe room.

Exits.Description: A black door leads back to the backstage area.

rooms.Name: By the stage door
rooms.Description:
Here at the end of a dark, garbage-strewn alleyway is a heavy steel
door leading into the building to the west.  A single lightbult burns
above the door, barely illuminating a sign screwed to the wall here.  
Loud music pounds behind the door and you can just hear voices softly
murmuring over the noise.

Exits.Description: The alley before you looks dark and threatening.
The stage door to Taffy Lewis' nightclub is here.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The sign reads, "TAFFY LEWIS' NIGHTCLUB"
                 DELIVERIES ONLY PLEASE"

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
Standing on the street here in the fourth sector, your mouth waters from
the delicious smells coming from the outdoor nooble bar that is just to
the north.  The streets are fairly crowded and overhead the occasional
police spinner speeds by.  A dark museum is to the south that looks
closed.  The sizzling woks behind the counter make your stomach rumble.

Exits.Description: The door here leads into the Origami Museum.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the street just east of Taffy Lewis' nightclub.
The loud music playing inside makes the sidewalk vibrate under your
feet as you watch an endless parade of people walk by.  There is a
rather dark alley to the north.

Exits.Description: A dark alley leads into the shadows to the north.
The door to the south is marked "TATTOOS".
A noisy, well-lit nightclub is just down the street.

rooms.Name: In the alley
rooms.Description:
This narrow, dark alleyway is littered with refuse and smells of urine and
rotting garbage.  You can hear the rats scurrying in the darkness over
the loud music playing on the otherside of the west wall.  The street
behind you to the south looks much safer than moving further into the
dark alley.

Exits.Description: A doorway lit by a single lightbulb is just to the north.
The alley leads back to the street to the south.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 4
rooms.Description:
You are out on the street in the Fourth Sector.  Just to the west is a
huge barricade that blocks the entire street.  A dark alleyway is just
to the south and there appears to be a large apartment building just
to your east.

Exits.Description: A dark alleyway leads to the south.
The sector barricade rises just to the west.

rooms.Name: Sector 4 barricade
rooms.Description:
The western end of Sector 4 ends here at a huge, plastisteel barrier
that was erected during the clone wars.  Designed to control traffic
between the various sectors in Los Angeles, the barriers have remained
sealed for over 20 years.  Only air traffic is allowed to move between
sectors, and only if they have the proper permits.

Exits.Description: The street to the east is crowded and brightly lit.
A massive steel door looks rusted shut.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 7
rooms.Description:
Here on the crowded streets of sector 7, money and affluence are obvious
in the expensive stores and businesses.  A strong police presence is
obvious here, especially so close to the headquarters of the Tyrell
Corporation.  There is a small music store to the east.

Exits.Description: A door leads into the Music Store.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 7
rooms.Description:
Here in the middle of the commercial district of Sector 7, numerous
businesses line the streets at the base of the towering buildings that
seem to leap towards the sky.  Tourists, police, and various business
people run their important errands while vehicles soar high above your
head.  Some sort of electronics store is to the east while a Travel
Agency is to the west.

Exits.Description: An amored door leads into the security emporium.
A heavy glass door leads into the Travel Agency.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 7
rooms.Description:
A dark alleyway leads to the north here at the bend of the street
in the middle of Sector Seven.  The tall buildings lining both
sides of the street keep the sunlight from reaching the pavement
except for a few minutes every day.  A seedy liquor store is here
and other stores and businesses can be seen to the east and south.

Exits.Description: A dark alley extends to the north.
The street turns east a ways down the street.
A door leads into the Liquor store.

rooms.Name: On the street - Sector 7
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the base of a huge, pyramid-like building that is
the famous Tyrell Corporation headquarters.  Bronze colored with slanted
sides, this massive building houses the richest and most powerful
company in the world.  A huge revolving door leads to the lobby.

Exits.Description: A huge revolving door leads into the Tyrell Corporation.
A door leads into the realty company.
The street turns south a ways down the street.

rooms.Name: Tyrell Corporation lobby
rooms.Description:
This huge, high-ceilinged lobby has been built in a neo-egyptian motif
with pyramid shapes, geometric decorations, and lots of gold.  The power
and wealth of the Tyrell Corporation is evident in this opulent
building where money appears to not have been an object.  Massive slabs
of jade-colored marble cover the floor while holoprojections of various
company products and projects flicker in the softly lit room.

Exits.Description: A huge revolving door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: The reception desk
rooms.Description:
The receptionist's desk is a massive, crescent-shaped table with the
Tyrell Corporation logo inlaid on the top with lapis-lazuli.  The desk
itself is made of a black,, highly-polished stone in whose flawless surface
you can see yourself perfectly reflected.  You can hear the fountain
in the center of the lobby but voices and footsteps seem strangely muted.

rooms.Name: The guard desk
rooms.Description:
This small passageway has a large sentry's desk build into the west
wall.  While the desk looks like wood you have a strange feeling that
it is well armored.  Beautifully concealed metal detectors are just
noticeable in the walls and the doors look strong and very heavy.
The lobby is to the west while some elevators are to the east.

Exits.Description: A door marked "PRIVATE" is to your east.

rooms.Name: Personnel office
rooms.Description:
This lavish office is the personnel center for the entire Tyrell
Corporation.  Heavily automated with a state-of-the-art Esper computer,
a small staff can easily manage the business of this large
corporation.  There are several desks and chairs scattered about the
room which has the look of a living room more than a business office.
Soft lighting and music completes the relaxing ambiance.  Perhaps you
would like to apply for a job?

Exits.Description: This door is marked "RECORDS."
This door is marked "INTERVIEW ROOM."

rooms.Name: Interview room
rooms.Description:
This large room contains a long meeting table surrounded with highbacked
chairs with the Tyrell Corporation log on them.  Several fans are 
slowly turning on the ceiling and the shaded windows on the west wall
are keeping the room fairly dim.  Ashtrays are scattered across the
table and it looks as if the room has been used a lot recently.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the east.

rooms.Name: Records room
rooms.Description:
This room contains a large, ESPER-grade computer which undoubtedly
automates much of the Tyrell Corporation's personnel department.  The
room is a bit warm and you think you detect a security stasis field
distorting your view of the computer.  Several data retrieval stations
are set in carrels along the walls.

Exits.Description: This door leads south.

rooms.Name: The private elevators
rooms.Description:
This small antechamber is made of pure white marble polished to a mirror
finish.  The crystal chandelier above causes a dazzling explosion of
reflections across the room.  There are elevator doors made of
different colored metals to the north, south, and east.

Exits.Description: A bronze elevator door is to the north.
A silver elevator door is to the east.
A gold elevator door is to the south.
An armored door is to the west.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 1
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass trim.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the south.

Exits.Description: The elevator door is made of a bronze-colored metal.
A light panel is set into the elevator ceiling.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 1
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass time.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the west.

Exits.Description: The elevator door is made of a silver-colored metal.
A light panel is set in the elevator ceiling.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 1
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass trim.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the north.

Exits.Description: The elevator door is made of a gold-colored metal.
A light panel is set in the ceiling of the elevator.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 121
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass trim.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the north.

Exits.Description: The elevator doors are made of a gold-colored metal.
The elevator floor is covered with beige carpeting.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 97
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass trim.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the south.

Exits.Description: The elevator door is made of a bronze-colored metal.
The elevator floor is covered with beige carpeting.

rooms.Name: High speed elevator - floor 65
rooms.Description:
The elevator interior is richly appointed with walnut panelling and
highly polished brass trim.  Your feet sink comfortably into the
plush carpeting on the floor while hidden ventilators create a slight
breeze of cool air.  The exit door is to the west.

Exits.Description: The elevator door is made of a silver-colored metal.
The elevator floor is covered with beige carpeting.

rooms.Name: The sitting room
rooms.Description:
This room is filled with sofas and overstuffed chairs.  The soft
indirect lighting and the quiet music make you feel relaxed just as
was probably intended.  The security cameras on the ceiling keep you
from relaxing too much as you realize that this close to the head
of the Tyrell Corporation, more than cameras are probably pointed at
you.

Exits.Description: A door is to the north.
Some gold elevator doors are to the south.

rooms.Name: Tyrell's home office
rooms.Description:
Eldon Tyrell's office is furnished with a simple desk and a few chairs.
The desk has a simple comset and a data terminal.  There are
some beautifully framed Michaelangelo prints on the wall.  With his 
wealth, you wonder if they might be the originals?

Exits.Description: A door is to the east.
A door is to the south.
A door leads to the west.

rooms.Name: The living room
rooms.Description:
This nicely furnished living room is filled with antiques and beautiful
bric-a-brac.  Despite the age of the furniture, the room looks oddly
unused.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the north.
A door leads to the east.
A door leads to the south.

rooms.Name: Tyrell's bedroom
rooms.Description:
This surprisingly small bedroom is furnished with elegant, antique
furniture of various vintages.  A king size bed is set between two
large dressers and are softly lit by indirect lighting.  There is a
comset next to the bed and a beautiful marble chess set at the foot
of the bed.  The walls are surprisingly bare and the room seems
unusually warm.

Exits.Description: An ornate white door is to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This expensive comset has a voice print authorization circuit that is
undoubtedly keyed to Doctor Tyrell's voice.  You won't be able to use it.
This chessboard has a game in progress.
This chessboard has a game in progress.
This chessboard has a game in progress.

The bed is covered with a heavy white comforter and appears to have a
down mattress.  The cost is difficult to surmise.

rooms.Name: The pantry
rooms.Description:
This room is filled with locked cabinets that are undoubtedly full of
Doctor Tyrell's favorite foods.  A single food reconstitutor is
mounted on the wall next to a water cooler.  For the brilliant head
of a multi-billion dollar corporation, Doctor Tyrell appears to have
somewhat simple tastes in nutrition.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the north.

rooms.Name: Tyrell's meeting room
rooms.Description:
This huge room is dominated by a very long, dark wood table that is
set at right angles to a wall of glass to the east that looks out over
the city.  Ornate columns line the north and south walls where moldings
with a pyramid design run along the floor.  There are two marble busts
on either side of the window wall and some exquisite bonsai are set
on a small laquered table by the door.  There are some polarizing
controls for the window wall next to the door.

Exits.Description: A door is to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Both busts are of an older gentleman who wears thick glasses.  He looks
somewhat familiar.

A simple rotary control allows you to darken or lighten the window wall
to your preference.

This ancient bonsai is a beautifully windswept dogwood and a matching
cherry tree.  Both are set in ancient Ming Dynasty basins
with beautifully detailed moss and root work.

rooms.Name: Research and Development
rooms.Description:
This room is full of file cabinets and data terminals where lots of
statistical analysis programs seem to be running.  Your interest in
the glowing monitors is diverted by the acrid smell of chemicals
that seems to be coming from the room to the south.  The scent is 
something like a hospital but with some odd, alien odors included.

Exits.Description: A door marked "SUPPLIES" is to the north.
A silver-colored elevator door is to the east.
An unmarked, heavily-armored door is to the south.
A door marked "PARTS" is to the west.

rooms.Name: Prototype Laboratory
rooms.Description:
This laboratory is filled with some unusual equipment including medical
scanners, electron microscopes, ESPER computers, stress test machinery,
and numerous other high tech devices that you don't recognize.  The
chemical odor is very strong here, especially near the small surgical
theater in the center of the room.  There are three heavy steel doors to
the west, south, and east.

Exits.Description: A heavily armored door seals the Laboratory.
A steel door is marked with the number three.
A steel door is marked with the number two.
A steel door is marked with the number one.
A steel door is the only exit.

rooms.Name: Testing Room 2
rooms.Description:
This sparsely furnished room has a bunk, sink, toilet, and a data
terminal that is recessed into the wall.  Huge celestial star charts
cover the walls and ceilings and from the odd sensation of feeling
very light on your feet, you theorize that some sort of gravity
dampening device is in operation here.

Exits.Description: A steel door is the only exit.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The data terminal is currently displaying an engine schematic for a
Dreadnought class Orion fighter craft.

rooms.Name: Testing Room 3
rooms.Description:
This small chamber is somewhat better furnished than some of the other
room.  There is a queen-size bed here with mirrors on the ceiling and
soft, indirect lighting.  You wonder what type of prototype testing
goes on here?

Exits.Description: A steel door is the only exit.

rooms.Name: Parts Room
rooms.Description:
This room is filled with refrigerated drawers similar to a morgue.  The
room is very cold and is brightly lit with red light panels on the
ceiling.  Most of the stainless steel drawers appear to be locked but
one of them seems slightly ajar.

Exits.Description: A door is to the east.

rooms.Name: Supply Room
rooms.Description:
This room is filled with boxes, drums, and refrigerated cases full of
all sorts of laboratory supplies.  The room's temperature and humidity
are carefully monitored and security cameras keep all of the supplies
under strict surveillance.  A faint scent of rotting flesh seems
to occasionally hit you are you examine the room.

Exits.Description: A door is to the south.

rooms.Name: Crumbling hallway
rooms.Description:
This floor must have been long-abandoned since this corridor is in
a terrible state of repair.  The plaster walls are crumbling, the
light fixturess have been ripped out of the ceiling, and the
floor is covered with chunks of ceiling tile.  Although it is dark, 
you can just barely detect doors at both ends of the hall.  The lift
is to the south.

Exits.Description: The corridor continues to the east.
The lift is just to the south.
The corridor continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Crumbling hallway
rooms.Description:
Here at the western end of this decrepit hallway, the door shows
obvious signs of forced entry.  You notice a odd hole broken through
the wall next to the door, large enough to put your hand through.  It
is dark on the otherside of the door however, so you can't see
what is on the other side.  You notice some damp marks on the floor here
that might be recent footprints.  The hairs on the back of your neck
stand up as you consider your options.

Exits.Description: The lift is just to the east.
The corridor ends against a door to the west.

rooms.Name: Crumbling hallway
rooms.Description:
This corridor has been long abandoned and is heavily damaged.
The walls are covered with graffiti and water dripping from above has
caused much of the plaster to erode and crumble.  The floor under your
feet seems sturdy enough but you walk cautiously anyway.  You can see
a door to the east and the lift to the west.

Exits.Description: The corridor ends against a sturdy door.
The lift is just to the west.

rooms.Name: Abandoned apartment
rooms.Description:
This floor on the building is in terrible condition and appears very
unsafe.  The walls are crumbling, the floor is half torn up, and water
is dripping constantly from above, gathering in stagnant pools all over
the floor.  This room must have been part of an apartment at one time
but most of the surrounding walls have collapsed.  There is a single 
door to the south and the exit is to the west.

Exits.Description: The door hangs loosely on its hinges.
The door appears to have been kicked in

rooms.Name: Crumbling bathroom
rooms.Description:
This bathroom is no more than a small room filled with the shattered
remains of a white sink, tub, and toilet.  Plaster dust is caked over
all of the broken fixtures and water is drizzling constantly from
the old tub faucets.  There is a painted-over window to the south
and a door to the north.

Exits.Description: This door has been kicked in.
A window with broken panes looks painted shut.

rooms.Name: Out on a ledge
rooms.Description:
Wind and rain blind you as you stand on a ledge high above the city
streets below.  The ledge ends just to the west and continues to the
east.  It is narrow and crumbling in spots but looks passable if you
are crazy enough to continue.  You try not to look down as you
consider your options.

Exits.Description: A window with broken panes looks painted shut.
The precarious ledge continues to the east.

rooms.Name: Out on a ledge
rooms.Description:
You are standing precariously on a narrow ledge, high above the city
streets.  Far below you can see the sights and sounds of the city, but
up here you must concentrate to keep your balance.  The wind and rain
make it hard to see but it appears the ledge is damaged to the east
but in better condition to the west.  Some ornately-carved stonework
offers some handholds if you wish to climb higher up.

Exits.Description: The ledge looks heavily damaged to the east.
The precarious ledge continues to the west.
Some carved stonework offers handholds to climb up.

rooms.Name: Out on a ledge
rooms.Description:
Miraculously, you've survived the fall and landed on another ledge, far
below where you were.  The street is an easy jump below you and you
can't find any other way to go.

Exits.Description: The street is a short distance below you.

rooms.Name: Climbing the stonework
rooms.Description:
You are holding on for dear life, climbing on an ornately-carved
stone pillar that is built into the side of the building here.  Below
you can see a narrow ledge and the street far below.  Above, the
stonework continues and ends up near what appears to be a window.

Exits.Description: The carved stonework offers handholds to climb up.
The carved stonework leads down to a sturdy ledge.

rooms.Name: Climbing the stonework
rooms.Description:
You are clinging to a ornate, carved stone pillar that stops at the
eaves above you head and leads down into the swirling mists.  Your
fingers are getting very tired holding on.  Luckily there is a window
here.  If you can open it, perhaps you can rest inside.

Exits.Description: A painted-over window offers no glimpse of the room inside.
The carved stonework offers handholds to climb down.

rooms.Name: Huge storeroom
rooms.Description:
This dark storeroom is a crumbling death trap with ceiling beams
sagging from the ceiling, gaping holes scattered across the creaking
floor, and strange noises occasionally echoing from the shadows.
You are not sure which direction is which as you look for some sort
of an exit.

Exits.Description: A painted over window is to the south.

rooms.Name: Huge storeroom
rooms.Description:
This dark storeroom is a crumbling death trap with ceiling beams
sagging from the ceiling, gaping holes scattered across the creaking
floor, and strange noises occasionally echoing from the shadows.
You are not sure which direction is which as you look for some sort
of exit.

rooms.Name: Huge storeroom
rooms.Description:
This dark storeroom is a crumbling death trap with ceiling beams
sagging from the ceiling, gaping holes scattered across the creaking
floor, and strange noises occasionally echoing from the shadows.
You are not sure which direction is which as you search for some sort
of exit.

rooms.Name: Huge storeroom
rooms.Description:
This dark storeroom is a crumbling death trap with ceiling beams
sagging from the ceiling, gaping holes scattered across the creaking
floor, and strange noises occasionally echoing from the shadows.
You are not sure which direction is which as you look for some sort
of exit.

Exits.Description: A loose ceiling panel is just overhead.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge!

Exits.Description: A loose roofing panel is at your feet.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of a bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge!

Exits.Description: Its a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge!

Exits.Description: It's a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge!

Exits.Description: Its a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
