Exits.Description: Its a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge!

Exits.Description: Its a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this huge warehouse is filled with stacks of empty
shipping containers and packing crates.  These containers form narrow
aisles that crookedly crisscross the warehouse interior.  It looks
very dark inside and you can hear the scurrying of some unseen vermin.

Exits.Description: A battered door may lead back to the street.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this old warehouse is huge and filled with stacks of
empty shipping containers and crates.  These stacks form meandering
corridors that quickly confuse you, causing you to lose your sense of
direction.  You begin to get nervous as you wander down the narrow
aisles, looking for the exit.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this old warehouse is huge and filled with stacks of
empty shipping containers and crates.  These stacks form meandering
corridors that quickly confuse you, causing you to lose your sense of
direction.  You begin to get nervous as you wander down the narrow
aisles, looking for the exit.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this old warehouse is huge and filled with stacks of
empty shipping containers and crates.  These stacks form meandering
corridors that quickly confuse you, causing you to lose your sense of
direction.  You begin to get nervous as you wander down the narrow
aisles, looking for the exit.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this old warehouse is huge and filled with stacks of
empty shipping containers and crates.  These stacks form meandering
corridors that quickly confuse you, causing you to lose your sense of
direction.  You begin to get nervous as you wander down the narrow
aisles, looking for the exit.

Exits.Description: A steel reinforced door leads west.

rooms.Name: Abandoned warehouse
rooms.Description:
The interior of this old warehouse is huge and filled with stacks of
empty shipping containers and crates.  These stacks form meandering
corridors that quickly confuse you, causing you to lose your sense of
direction.  You begin to get nervous as you wander down the narrow
aisles, looking for the exit.

Exits.Description: An odor of rotting fish is coming from a large vent.

rooms.Name: On the wharf
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a rotting and creaking dock that lines the north
side of this decaying wharf area.  The back of a large warehouse is
to the north and you can see a boat of somekind down at the end of the
wharf to the west.  To the east you can see what appears to be some
sort of commercial area.

Exits.Description: A large, rusty air vent lets air into the warehouse.
The murky waters below look filthy and polluted.

rooms.Name: On the wharf
rooms.Description:
The wharf comes to an end here, with a cluster of shops visible to the
south and the wharf extending to the west.  A large warehouse is to
the north and the polluted waters of the harbor lap at the pilings
that hold up the warped, rotting wood boards that you are standing on.
The air smells of salt water and rotting fish, and garbage is strewn
everywhere.

Exits.Description: The murky waters below look filthy and polluted.

rooms.Name: The flesh market - Sector 2
rooms.Description:
Here in Sector 2 is the location of most of the black markets in
Los Angeles.  With its convenient location near the wharf and the
lack of police attention, all kinds of semi-legal and outright criminal
commerce takes place here amidst the sleazy stores and crowded
streets.  Keep one eye on your wallet and the other looking over your
shoulder.  Best not to walk alone here.

Exits.Description: The shop door has a picture of a snake on it.

rooms.Name: The flesh market - Sector 2
rooms.Description:
The market seems to come to an end here with several stores appearing
open here.  With the advent of universal air travel, the streets and
roads of Los Angeles have been slowly disappearing as the precious real
estate has been slowly absorbed by new buildings and structures.

Exits.Description: An armored door leads into the establishment.
This door has Japanese characters written on it.
A door leads into Eye World.

rooms.Name: Eye World
rooms.Description:
This tiny shop is freezing cold, and filled with all sorts of weird
equipment.  There is a main laboratory bench with a large microscope
surrounded by small plastic samples dishes with small, round 
objects in them.  Several liquid-cooled tanks line the walls which
bubble incessantly.  You can see your breath and begin to shiver.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out of the shop.

rooms.Name: Tissue Microscopy
rooms.Description:
This somewhat shabby laboratory has several aging electron microscopes
and an obsolete pre-ESPER computer processing samples and electric
phoretic data.  Huge cabinets full of slides and data cartridges line
the walls providing an enormous research archive.

Exits.Description: An armored door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: Human Organs R Us
rooms.Description:
This large establishment is a single, highly refrigerated room full
of various sizes and shapes of tissue containers and other types of
insulated chests and coolers.  The faint odor of rot lingers in the
frigid air here.  The cluttered and poorly maintained shop gives you
the impression that illegally procured organs may be available
here.  Be careful because the Black Market is always looking for
healthy subjects to kidnap and dissect.

Exits.Description: An ugly pink door leads into the store.

rooms.Name: On the deck of a junk
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the mildly pitching deck of a large Chinese junk
that is moored here at the end of the dock.  It's sail is unfurled and
it looks poorly maintained and unseaworthy.  Its timbers are rotting
and its metalwork is heavily corroded.  A single hatch leads down to
the compartment below.

Exits.Description: A flimsy gate is at the end of the gangplank.
A heavy wooden hatch leads below decks.

rooms.Name: Below decks
rooms.Description:
This cramped compartment is dark and smells strongly of opium.
Unlabelled boxes and bags are piled up along the walls which creak and
groan with the swells.  You notice a surveillance dampening device
mounted on the ceiling.  This expensive high-tech item looks out of
place in the midst of this crumbling boat and its contents.

Exits.Description: A heavy wooden hatch leads back to the deck.

rooms.Name: Neural Implants Incorporated
rooms.Description:
This small shop is meticulously clean and full of all kinds of high
tech equipment.  Security cameras monitor the store activity where
the shopkeepers wear lab coats and a glazed look in their eyes.  You
could probably buy all sorts of neural enhancement chips here, if
you could convince them to deal with you.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out onto the street.

rooms.Name: At the end of the wharf
rooms.Description:
You are walking along an old, creaking dock that extends out into
the polluted waters of the harbor.  To the west you can see a small
boat moored at the end of the dock.  The city rises above you to the
east where spinners slice through the sky and huge towers jut into
the skyline.

Exits.Description: A flimsy gate stands between you and the water.
The murky waters below look filthy and polluted.

rooms.Name: In the harbor waters
rooms.Description:
You jump into the filthy, polluted waters of the Los Angeles Harbor and
you immediately feel your flesh burning and you scream out in pain
as acidic vapors sear your lungs.  Creatures with tiny, needle-sharp
teeth stab at your exposed skin as you struggle to stay afloat.  If by
some miracle you survive this swim, you may be able to climb up the
pilings and get back up on the dock.

Exits.Description: Some splintered pilings offer a way to climb back out of the water.

rooms.Name: Theater Lobby
rooms.Description:
This theater lobby is a spectacular reproduction of the lavish and
ornate theaters of the mid-twentieth century.  All done in gold
and crimson, the plush carpeting and the dense wall-hanging speak of
an opulance that only exists off-world now.  Massive crystal
chandeliers hang over the smoke filled room where patrons indulge
in their smoking choices.  You can hear the low murmur of music
and voices coming from the doors to the south.  The movie must have
started!

Exits.Description: A heavy glass door leads back onto the street.
This door leads into the theater.

rooms.Name: Theater seats - left side
rooms.Description:
As your eyes adjust to the dark theater, you realize that there are
plenty of empty seats.  The lavish interior looks worn and badly in
need of repair as you look for a place to sit down.  The movie has
already started but you can't quite make out the words or the picture.
Perhaps you should ask for your money back.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the lobby.

rooms.Name: At the snack bar
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of one of the most wonderful places on earth, the
movie theater concession stand.  Stale popcorn, rancid butter, overpriced
candy, and flat soft drinks that you actually want to buy.  You lean on the
greasy counter that is littered with straw papers and read the menu.

Exits.Description: A door leads into the theater.

rooms.Name: Theater seats - right side
rooms.Description:
The theater is surprisingly small but there are plenty of empty seats.
Your feet make a lot of noise as you walk down the aisle as you crunch
on pieces of popcorn and adhere to the sticky floor.  The movie has
started but seems slightly out of focus.  It is also in a language
that you don't know.  Perhaps you should wait for the cartoon?

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the lobby.
The door here is marked "EMERGENCY EXIT."

rooms.Name: In the old subway car
rooms.Description:
Lit fitfully from sputtering neon tubes, this long abandoned subway car
has clearly become the home to a large number of people.  Crates of food
and piles of mattresses litter the floor.  The drivers compartment has
been gutted and electrical cables crisscross the floor, powering the
lights and some small heaters.  There is a door at the back of the car
and an exit door that leads back to the subway platform.

Exits.Description: The subway car's door leads back to the abandoned station.
A door leads to the next subway car.

rooms.Name: In the old subway car
rooms.Description:
This subway car is similar to the others, filled with mattresses and all
sorts of supplies.  The floor is covered with dark stains and is rather
sticky to walk across.  There are numerous butchering tools here that
look well-used and well-cared-for.  There is a sharpening wheel to keep
their edges keen.  You wonder what the denizens of this abandoned subway
car are butchering . . .

Exits.Description: A door leads to the next car.
A door leads to the next subway car.

rooms.Name: In the old subway car
rooms.Description:
This subway car is clearly used for cooking.  The ceiling has been
partially cut away to allow the smoke from a brazier to rise out of
the interior.  The fire is carefully banked and is burning slowly,
making the subway car uncomfortably warm.  Your eyes burn slightly in
the smokey car and you wonder what's for dinner.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the next subway car.
A door leads to the next subway car.

rooms.Name: In the old subway car
rooms.Description:
You can barely make out the tunnel to the west through the windows at
the end of this subway car.  This car is not lit although you can see
light glimmering around the doorway that leads to another car to the
east.  You notice a lot of battle damage here, probably from various
skirmishes that have been fought over the years.  There is an access
panel on the floor that appears to be unbarred.

Exits.Description: A door leads to the next subway car.
An access panel is visible on the floor.

rooms.Name: In the subway tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tracks have been torn up here in the tunnel just to the west of the
back of a motionless subway car.  Water is dripping from overhead and
pools of stagnant water cover the crumbling concrete floor.  There is a
large pile of refuse here which include strangely human-looking bones.
The odor is unbelievable and you won't be able to stay here for long.

Exits.Description: An access panel is visible under the subway car.

rooms.Name: In the subway tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are far underground, in a dark tunnel that was once used by a subway.
The rails have long been removed by scavengers and a foul odor permeates
the area.  The odor is especially strong to the east.  Rats scurry at
your feet as you step across stagnant pools of foul-smelling water and
wonder what surprises lurk at either end of the tunnel.

rooms.Name: In the subway tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a long-abandoned subway tunnel that has partially
collapsed to the west and continues to the east.  The rails have been
ripped up by scavengers and a foul odor seems to be drifting from the
distance.  Some graffiti has been spray painted on the walls here and
the floor looks oddly worn and clean in one spot.  Your ears are filled
with the sounds of dripping water and the echoing chittering of rats
but you seem to detect the sounds of the city from here as well.

Exits.Description: The tunnel looks dangerously unstable from here.
A wooden trapdoor is right over your head.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This spot on the floor looks like it is worn and cleaner than the rest.
Perhaps from people walking here.

The graffiti are all worn and hard to read, but a skull and crossbones is
still visible.

rooms.Name: The partially collapsed tunnel
rooms.Description:
The unstable tunnel collapses over you, burying you under tons of dirt
and chunks of concrete.  With pain screaming in your bones, you scramble
trying to dig yourself out before you die, coughing in the swirls of
foul dust that fills the air.  Perhaps it would have been wiser to pay
more attention to the graffiti in the tunnels.

Exits.Description: A hidden panel is barely visible behind some rubbish.

rooms.Name: A dark alley
rooms.Description:
This narrow, dark alley is ominous and threatening.  As you peer into the
darkness you wonder what dangers might be waiting for you.  Perhaps it
would be better to stay out on the streets.

Exits.Description: A dark alley stretches to the north.
The street is visible at the end of the alley.

rooms.Name: A dark alley
rooms.Description:
This dark alley smells strongly of rotting trash and something
worse that is difficult to place.  Trash and debris clutter the
path between the buildings making it difficult to make your way
safely or quietly down the alley.  A large dumpster is at the end
of the alley to the north, the street is visible to the south.

Exits.Description: The dark alley stretches to the south.
The dumpster has a rusty steel lid.

rooms.Name: In the dumpster
rooms.Description:
There is very little to say about this but you are sitting in a dumpster.
Trash and rotting foods and liquids squish under your feet while an
unbelievably foul odor makes it difficult to keep conscious.

Exits.Description: The dumpster has a rusty steel lid.
A wooden trapdoor is beneath your feet in the dumpster.

rooms.Name: The Corporate Club
rooms.Description:
This large room is sumptuously furnished with massive leather sofas, easy
chairs, and scattered tables.  Plush carpeting covers the floor and rare
wood panelling covers the walls.  You notice a green felt-covered card
table and a huge hookah set in the middle of the room.  Soft music is
playing and a gentle breeze is generated by the elaborate brass fans that
are spinning lazily on the ceiling.  The incredible wealth that this
room represents takes your breath away.  Membership must be very
exclusive.

Exits.Description: Some elevator doors are to the north.
Some billiard tables are visible in the next room.
Sweet curls of smoke come from the room to the south.
A bar is visible through the opening to the west.

rooms.Name: The Lounge
rooms.Description:
This room is dominated by a long bar that runs the entire length of the
room.  Behind the bar stand row upon row of exotic liquors and spirits 
from many countries and many worlds.  Bar stools and numerous small
tables offer places to sit while enjoying the various refreshments that
are available here.  You notice that no prices are listed, obviously
club membership includes the bartenders expert services.

Exits.Description: An ornately carved door marked "PRIVATE" is to the south.

rooms.Name: The opium den
rooms.Description:
This small room has large pillows covering much of the floor.  There is a
small brazier burning in the center of the room next to a carved wooden
container full of long tapers.  The room is softly lit by several racks
of large candles and the room is full of the sickly sweet smell of
burning opium.  You can hear the distance whirr of air scrubbers keeping
the smoke from invading the rest of the club.  If you stay here too long,
you may not want to leave.

rooms.Name: The billiard room
rooms.Description:
This dimly lit room is dominated by a single billiard table set in the
center of the room.  Several shaded lamps hang from the ceiling over the
billiard table, bathing its pristine green felt with soft light.  There
are racks of pool cues mounted to the walls and there appears to be a
game in progress.  There is a lot of cigarette smoke in this room which
casts the room in a soft haze.

rooms.Name: The private hallway
rooms.Description:
Once inside this hallway, you notice that the sounds of the club completely
disappear behind the sound-proofed walls and doors.  There are four doors
here including the north door that returns to the lounge.  The remaining
door are unmarked and you wonder what may be behind them.

Exits.Description: An ornately carved door leads to the north.
A non-descript door leads to the east.
A non-descript door leads to the south.
A non-descript door leads to the west.

rooms.Name: The Dungeon
rooms.Description:
A wave of apprehension washes over you as you look around this oppressive
chamber.  The sadistic and fiendish nature of the various instruments
and furnishings that fill this bondage dungeon make you realize that the
people that utilize this facility must truly love their perverse taste
in pain and pleasure.  You gut tightens as you realize that this
grotesque room could be used just as easily for torture than for
sado-masochistic fantasies.

Exits.Description: A door to the east is the only exit you see.

rooms.Name: The Waterbed Room
rooms.Description:
A large, round waterbed is in the center of this room.  Set into the
walls are huge aquariums filled with exotic fish and underwater plants.
Lit from behind the aquariums, this room gives you the feeling that you
are underwater as the fish swim endlessly around their artificial
reefs and the spectacularly colored tropical plants.  The gentle sound
of the ocean is being piped in from some hidden speaker.  The effect is
extraordinarily relaxing.

Exits.Description: The door to the north is the only exit you see.

rooms.Name: The Orgy Room
rooms.Description:
This room is completely featureless and at first you think it is empty.
As you step inside you realize suddenly that the entire floor is as soft
as a mattress.  You reach down and touch the floor and find it feels like
skin and is warm to the touch.  Perhaps the Tyrell researchers have
created a living floor - who knows what it might be able to do?

Exits.Description: A door to the west is the only exit you see.

rooms.Name: Tattoo Parlor
rooms.Description:
This grimy shop is dimly lit except for the corner where the tattoo
artist plies his trade.  The walls are covered with pictures, sketches,
and photographs of various designs.  The shop owner has a dermal etch
diffuser to remove tattoos as well, in case you change your mind and
want a change.  The artistry appears outstanding, but you are concerned
about the hygiene as you look over the dirty equipment.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out to the street.

rooms.Name: A dark alleyway
rooms.Description:
Just south of the busy city street, the light quickly diminishes to
complete darkness as you explore the alley.  A faint sense of foreboding
comes over you and you wonder if you should head back for the street.

Exits.Description: The alleyway ends a few feet to the north.
The dark alleyway continues south.  It is getting very dark.

rooms.Name: A dark alleyway
rooms.Description:
It is very, very dark here in this tarash-cluttered alleyway.  A faint
glimmer of light can be seen far to the north.  To the south, only inky
blackness can be seen.  Some sixth sense makes you uncertain if you want
to continue south.

Exits.Description: You may detect a faint glimmer of light to the north.

It is so dark to the south that you cannot see the slightest thing.  A
sense of fear washes over you as your sixth sense kicks into high gear.
You hesitate, wondering if you should continue.

rooms.Name: A dark alleyway
rooms.Description:
Burning, agonizing pain knocks you to the ground as you cross a ionthread
tripwire.  You are aware that your body has sustained massive damage
although you cannot see anything for several minutes.  You wonder if
the boobytrap has killed you or if you will recover.  You embrace the
pain and try to overcome it . . .

Exits.Description: Its too dark to see what lies ahead in the alleyway.

rooms.Name: A dark alleyway
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of a long, dark alley that extends into the
darkness to the north.  This small area is oddly clean and the normal water
that drips constantly from above in the city is missing here.  It is very
dark to th enorth and you get a strange feeling of danger from the shadows.

Exits.Description: It is too dark to the north to see the slightest thing.

rooms.Name: Abdul Ben Hassan's
rooms.Description:
This interior of this dingy shop is very dry and warm.  Heavy glass
aquariums line the walls, filled with all sorts of snakes.  Most of 
them appear colorful, large, and poisonous.  The odd, dry smell makes
your nose itch as you look around the shop.  The slow, slithering
sounds that surround you keep you glancing at your feet.

Exits.Description: The shop door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: In the revolving door
rooms.Description:
You are inside a smoothly-turning revolving door made of armored glass
and highly polished steel.  It makes a faint whooshing sound as it
turns and you find yourself becoming a little disoriented as you walk.

Exits.Description: A spectacular lobby is to the north.
The street lies just to the south.

rooms.Name: Deckhard's Apartment
rooms.Description:
This is a mob chute room for Deckard mob.  It feets to itself and
to the three different sectors in zone.   Rooms 6624 (Rachel's room),
6691 (Sebastian's apartment) and 6728 (Wharf area).

rooms.Name: Off World Travel Agency
rooms.Description:
This small office of one of thousands such Travel Agency offices around
the world.  If you have the money, and do not have any diseases or
genetic defects of any sort, you can migrate to the Outer World colonies
and live the good life.  The posters on the wall display several alien
worlds, all beautiful, clean, and uncrowded.

Exits.Description: A heavy glass door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: The brothel
rooms.Description:
This is a mob chute for the Gaff mob named to inspire some curiousity in
players who where the mob and can never find the brothel.  Just putting
it in for fun.  If you're an immort reading this, you've spoiled the fun!

rooms.Name: A secret cache
rooms.Description:
Behind the hidden panel is a small cavity into which you can barely
crawl.  This small area must be a secret hiding place of one of the
gang members.  You dig through the rubbish, wondering what might be
hidden here.

Exits.Description: A panel leads back to the collapsed section of subway tunnel.

rooms.Name: On the tracks
rooms.Description:
As you step down on the tracks, a powerful jolt of electricity slams you
off of your feet and you cartwheel wildly through the air.  With a
sickening thud, your head slams into the concrete just next to the
platform and pain and stars fill your consciousness.  You wonder if you
will survive or die as you lie here dazed in the subway tunnel.

Exits.Description: The platform is just to your south.

rooms.Name: The partially collapsed tunnel
rooms.Description:
The abandoned subway tunnel has collapsed here and it is impossible
to continue to the west.  To the east, the empty, crumbling tunnel
extends into the darkness.  You have to climb carefully over the
chunks of fallen concrete and breath the swirling dust to try to
get out of this dangerous area.

Exits.Description: An abandoned tunnel extends to the east.
A hidden panel is barely visible behind some rubbish.

rooms.Name: Over the edge
rooms.Description:
You fall screaming off the top of the building, landing with a sickening
thud on top of a spinner that is driving along the street below.  As the
vehicle skids to a halt, you fight to keep conscious as pain from your
injuries lance through you like fire.  If you could only live long enough
to slide down off the spinner and get some help . . .

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
The wind is howling and sheets of rain spatter across you as you stand
shivering here high on top of the building.  Standpipes, vents, and all sorts
of odd devices and antennas rise from the roof like some sort of bizarre
forest.  You have to walk carefully to avoid tripping.  Be sure to keep
away from the edge.

Exits.Description: Its a long, long way down to the street.

rooms.Name: The Music Store
rooms.Description:
This old music store still carries a good selection of the tiny
microCD music disks.  The walls are covered with various posters
and some old Nirvana tune is thumping out some hidden speakers.
The air smells faintly of incense and you have a sudden urge to
wear beads and tiedye.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: The Matsushista Surveillance Company
rooms.Description:
This show room is competely barren.  Plain white walls and a 
sterile concrete floor are all that is visible.  You get the
eerie feeling that you are being watched and scanned.  Suddenly
a voice booms from a hidden speaker saying, "State your business
or leave the premises."

Exits.Description: A heavy armored door leads back to the street.

rooms.Name: Chong's Liquor store
rooms.Description:
One thing about liquor stores, they all look pretty much alike.
This establishment is no exception.  Its dreary interior is lined
with tall shelves filled with all sorts of liquors and aperatifs.
A faint, sour smell mixed with dust and mildew makes your nose
itch.  Armed cameras are mounted in each corner of the store and
you have no doubt that someone or something is watching you with
its finger on the trigger.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out onto the street.

rooms.Name: Century 22 Realty
rooms.Description:
This realty company office looks abandoned, or at least rarely
used.  Property on Earth has been dropping in value ever since the
opening up of the Outer Colonies.  Most people now simple claim
property as their own by occupying it.  Few people care about it
since most of the buildings in the cities are nearly empty.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out to the street.

rooms.Name: A dark alleyway
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside of a heavy steel door marked "EMERGENCY EXIT"
in a dark, garbage-strewn alleyway.  The alley ends to the east and
continues into the darkness to the west.  The smell of stale popcorn and
grease is strong here for some reason.

Exits.Description: A door marked "EMERGENCY EXIT" is here.

rooms.Name: Museum of Origami
rooms.Description:
This tiny museum has three walls covered with tiny picture frames
containing the most ingenious and intricate origami that you have
ever seen.  People, mythical creatures, objects, animals, everything
imaginable has been cleverly created from pieces of paper.  There is
a door labelled "CLASSES" in the back of the store which has a large
"CLOSED " sign on it.  You assume that the company offering the art
classes has folded.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the street.
The door to the classrooms has a "CLOSED" sign on it.

rooms.Name: A misty road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a paved road that is almost hidden by a heavy
mist.  Odd sounds softly echo in the distance as you quickly become
disoriented and wonder where you are going.  You have an odd sense
that time is somehow warping around you and an icy fear runs through
you as you try to decide which way to go.

rooms.Name: A misty road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a paved road that is almost hidden by a heavy
mist.  Odd sounds echo softly in the distance as you quickly become
disoriented and wonder where you are going.  You have an odd sense
that time is somehow warping around you and an icy fear runs through
you as you try to decide which way to go.  An illuminated sign glows
by the side of the road.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The sign reads, "WARNING - The Temporal Police have identified a fault in the
space time continuum south of this point.  Proceed at your own risk."

rooms.Name: A misty road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a paved road that is almost hidden by a heavy
mist.  Odd sounds echo softly in the distance as you quickly become
disoriented and wonder where you are going.  You have an odd sense
that time is somehow warping around you and an icy fear runs through
you as you try to decide which way to go.

rooms.Name: A misty road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a paved road that is almost hidden by a heavy
mist.  Odd sounds echo softly in the distance as you quickly become
disoriented and wonder where you are going.  You have an odd sense
that time is somehow warping around you and an icy fear runs through
you as you try to decide which way to go.

rooms.Name: A misty road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a paved road that is almost hidden by a heavy
mist.  Odd sounds echo softly in the distance as you quickly become
disoriented and wonder where you are going.  The mist seems to thin
somewhat to the west and you catch glimpses of what appears to be
a city street in the distance.
